title: Did Betsy DeVos Say COVID-19 Will ‘Only’ Kill .02% of US Students?
subtitle: Per the claim, which circulated widely among U.S. teachers and parents, that would mean 14,740 children and teens would die.
author: Jessica Lee
vclaim: In July 2020, U.S. Education Secretary Betsy DeVos said "only" .02% of the country's K-12 school students — totaling 14,740 children and teens — are likely to die from COVID-19 when and if schools fully reopen.
